Our system ( single model ).from sentence: Our system ( single model ) can achieve 70.0 % exact match and 79.0 % F 1 scores on the test set , which surpasses all the published results and can match the top performance on the SQuAD leaderboard at the time of writing .

aligned question embedding feature.from sentence: Without the aligned question embedding feature ( only word embedding and a few manual features ) , our system is still able to achieve F1 over 77 % .

f aligned and f exact match.from sentence: More interestingly , if we remove both f aligned and f exact match , the performance drops dramatically , so we conclude that both features play a similar but complementary role in the feature representation related to the paraphrased nature of a question vs. the context around an answer .
